articles.title: Marvel Just Fired Jonathan Majors. What Now? - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Marvel Studios finally showed their Kang the Conqueror, villain of the MCU's Phase Six, the door following his domestic-violence conviction.
articles.content: While Kang is the most prominent time-traveling villain in Marvel Comics, it’s notable that he never seems interested in using time travel to change the past, preferring instead to visit different er… [+4040 chars]
